Action.Name: CheckRemainingDaysOfHoliday
Action.ActualValue: SQL#IF $CURRENT_ITEM[TypeEn] <> (SELECT EnumValues.[ItemID] FROM EnumValues INNER JOIN EnumTypes ON EnumValues.EnumType = EnumTypes.[ItemID] WHERE EnumName = 'VacationType' AND EnumValues.[FileAs] = 'VacationType - Paid vacation') BEGIN SELECT 1 END ELSE BEGIN IF ((SELECT RemainingDaysOfHoliday FROM Users INNER JOIN UnifiedRelations ON ItemGUID1 = Users.[ItemID] AND ItemGUID2 = $CURRENT_ITEM[ItemGUID] AND RelationType = 'VACATION') < $CURRENT_ITEM[Duration]) BEGIN SELECT 0 END ELSE BEGIN SELECT 1 END END
Action.NotEqualMessage: There is not enough vacation days left.
